title: AFKs in ranked que
body: Ohk now everyone has had someone go afk in ranked game and its super frustrating especially when you've just turned the game around! this is something me and my brother where chatting about and i think it would make a good addition to ranked  so  1,  first off if someone is afk there opposing team member of the same position ie jungler receives a 50% debuff until the return of the afk player or 2, the remaining 4 players on the team with the afk only lose half the lp they would have with the afk player recieving full lp lose this would not only stop people from going afk when they choose to but also allow people who feel ripped for someone going afk not to lose so much lp ideas?

replies.body: I reckon lose half LP makes sense. Espacially now with the meta being AFK jungle
